<<<<<<< HEAD
The result of a synod at Cambridge in New-England, anno 1646 concerning the [brace] power of magistrates in matters of the first table, nature & power of synods, and other matters thereunto belonging. Cotton, John, 1584-1652. Congregational churches in Massachusetts. Cambridge Synod.
[2], 75, [1] p.
Printed by M.S. for John Allen and Francis Eglesfield ..., London : 1654.
Erroneously attributed to John Cotton. Cf. Cotton's The covenant of grace, 1655, p. [17] of first prelim. count. Imperfect: print show-through with slight loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======

[2], 75, [1] p.
Printed by M.S. for John Allen and Francis Eglesfield ..., London : 1654.
Erroneously attributed to John Cotton. Cf. Cotton's The covenant of grace, 1655, p. [17] of first prelim. count. Imperfect: print show-through with slight loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
Francis Eglesfield
John Allen
M.S.
